name: FITUNA
slogan: Shop health + fitness products recommended and reviewed by expert influencers
description:
Here at FITUNA, we are building a community for women to feel inspired, confident and motivated to be their best selves.

One of the main reasons influencers use their Instagram is to inspire people, to spread positive messages and to ultimately help as many people as they can reach.

FITUNA shares that common goal. FITUNA was started by someone who wanted to improve their lifestyle and was a little overwhelmed with where to start. Looking to Instagram, influencers helped the founder change her life. Now, we want that to be available to women globally.

FITUNA is an online catalog of products, each of which has been recommended by an influencer in the health + fitness industry. These products lye within clothing, shoes, equipment, beauty and nutrition. 

Women browse through our products, understanding who has recommended them and why. This enables them to feel confident with their decision of which products will help them as an individual to achieve their health and fitness goals.

jobs.title: Marketing Assistant - Internship (Travel Expenses Only)
jobs.description:
Looking for a pro-active, enthusiastic individual who is familiar with social media, influencers and has an interest in health and fitness.
Want to learn something? Let us know and we will teach you what we know.
A great start up to be a part of to understand influencer marketing, brand collaborations and partnerships and affiliate linking. FITUNA works with professionals in the health and fitness industry.
What you will be doing:
- Content creation (including weekly blog posts)
- Social media account management
- Website management and upkeep (wordpress knowledge beneficial but this can be taught)
- Managing Influencer Relationships
- Brand Collaboration Management
- Searching for on-brand influencers to invite to join the FITUNA family
